long_description: With the retro-cool look of the Smith Shorewood Polarized sunglasses there's no need to worry about style, freeing you up to spend your time getting ready for whatever's in store on the road ahead. Polarized carbonic polycarbonate lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Hydrophilic Megol(TM) nosepiece and temple ends on the Smith Shorewood Polarized sunglasses become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Frames are made from bio-plastic Rislan(R) Clear (derived from non-GMO castor seeds) for a resilient, durable and consistent fit.
short_description: With the retro-cool look of the Smith Shorewood Polarized sunglasses there's no need to worry about style, freeing you up to spend your time getting ready for whatever's in store on the road ahead.
